name: Cyberlink AVCHD Video File
summary: Learn about .JTS files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: JTS files can be converted to more common video file types using Cyberlink software, such as .AVI and .MP4 files.
NOTE: Cyberlink video software is sometimes included with JVC digital camcorder purchases.

description: High-definition video file downloaded from a JVC HD camcorder and edited with Cyberlink video-editing software; contains video data stored in an MPEG-4 AVCHD format; used to preserve high-definition video from the camcorder.
